'''Chizhang Map''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained in an [[Exquisite Chest]] after completing a [[Jade Incense Cauldron]] puzzle in [[Chizhang Wall]], [[Liyue]].

Following it leads to a gate in southern Chizang Wall which can be unlocked using [[Ancient City Key]]. Once unlocked, the player is rewarded with three [[Chest]]s as well as the {{Achievement|At the Construction of the Endless Wall}}.

==Text==
"...On orders from above, a date has been set for the return... Within the wall we have sealed all our remaining supplies and equipment, for use in the event of an emer... recorded in this image..."
